text:
Known for her violent awakening and brain-splattering antics in Westworld, Evan Rachel Wood is now weighing in on DJ Khaled's controversial oral sex comments.

Twitter exploded earlier this week after a 2015 Breakfast Show interview with the married DJ resurfaced in which he made it pretty clear that he doesn't like to perform oral sex on women, but thinks that women should be prepared to do the deed for men.

He said (via Men's Health): "You gotta understand, we the king. There's some things that y'all might not wanna do, but it got to get done. I just can't do what you want me to do. I just can't. A woman should praise the man — the king."

Steven Lawton Getty Images

He then continued: "If you holding it down for your woman I feel like the woman should praise. And a man should praise the queen. But you know, my way of praising is called, 'How was dinner?', 'You like the house you living in? You like all them clothes you getting? I'm taking care of your family, I'm taking care of my family…' You know, I'm putting in the work."

Now Wood, who plays Dolores in HBO's sci-fi hit, has joined the conversation on Twitter.

The actress, who came out as bisexual six years ago, responded to Khaled by telling him: "You're seriously missing out man. Take it from someone who has pride and thoroughly enjoys pleasuring women. You should grow up."

Check out a few more disgruntled tweets below;

So DJ Khaled says he doesn’t go down on his chick, and now everything is a lie cause how can you be THE BEST if you’re not eatin the cooch!!! — Flawless Baguettes (@WizKidFro) May 5, 2018

I didn’t want DJ Khaled down there anyway — PENNYWILD (@PennyWildMusic) May 5, 2018

I could never be DJ Khaled’s wife, as much as I complain about not getting my choocha ate out now on a regular...gworl...sksnsjksnejsk I know id definitely be going THROUGH IT if I was her — ɢᴏʀɪʟʟᴀ ɢʀɪᴘ ᴄᴏᴏᴄʜɪᴇ (@COMMANDAINQUEEF) May 5, 2018

authors: Dan Seddon Is A Freelance News Writer At Digital Spy.
title: Westworld's Evan Rachel Wood tells DJ Khaled to "grow up" after making sex confession

og.title: Evan Rachel Wood calls out DJ Khaled
og.description: She had a pretty NSFW response to a pretty NSFW confession.

meta_data.title: Westworld's Evan Rachel Wood tells DJ Khaled to "grow up" after making sex confession
meta_data.description: The music producer was quoted 3 years ago on the Breakfast Show as not the type to give oral sex. Amongst the backlash, Westworld's bisexual leading actress has weighed in with comment.
